title: Merry Hearts
description: Sexy, festive and full of Merry and Bright…Pull up a chair and enjoy a snowy Christmas with your favorite Colorado ranchers.It’s December in Poplar Falls and the small town is thrumming with activity and alight with festivecheer. Merry Hearts features all your favorite couples coming together in one story to bring you joy,happiness, and a little Christmas hometown joy.Featuring:Sophie & Braxton (Rustic Hearts)Dallas & Myer (Stone Hearts)Elle & Walker (Wicked Hearts)Bellamy & Brandt (Fragile Hearts)A special surprise from Payne & Charlotte, and your favorite Aunts, Doreen & Ria!
author: Amber Kelly
